audit_history.note: Consolidated pipeline definition across 8-stage and 15-stage descriptions.

description: Dumptruck must process inputs via a stage-based pipeline that is explicit, composable, and operationally auditable. The pipeline definition consolidates the 15-stage detailed sequence into the higher-level 8-stage logical map, without losing the safety and forensic steps (evidence, chain of custody, secure deletion).
name: Stage-based processing pipeline
